title: ^Camp Fruit
intro: ^Summer. The most exciting time of the year.
^All the years before I just got to hang out with my friends at home. Playing video games and eating pizza and having good old fashioned kid fun.
^My parents decided that getting some outdoor time would be good for me.
^Plus they wanted to go to Europe.
^So here I am on my way to Camp Fruit.
arrive_at_camp: ^A gate on the road reads: "Camp Fruit! Where all your dreams come true!"
^Counselor: "Okay everyone! Get all your belongings and let's hike up to the cabin!"

c-1: ^Do they even have clean tap water here?
g-0: ^Counselor: "So here at Camp Fruit we make your dreams come true."
^Counselor: "Which means that you get to meet your best friend!"

gazebo_choice: ^There are three watermelons on the ground.
^Counselor: "Don't be shy. Inside of one of these watermelons is your new best friend!"
^Counselor: "Step up and pick one. You can't make a wrong choice!"
^I guess the one in the middle...

g-0: ^ watermelon before any other kid can.
^A shake from the watermelon startles you and you drop it!
^Counselor: "It's okay! These little guys are made of sturdy stuff."
^You peer closer and see a small crack in the melon.
^Instead of a bunch of delicious watermelon innards pouring out, there's a cute little animal.
^It gingerly steps out of the surrounding shell.
^It's basically a dog made out of watermelon?
^The beautiful creature shakes itself like a wet dog and bits of watermelon fruit rain everywhere.

pre_picnic: ^Counselor: "Hey, there's another kid that wants to talk to you over by the picnic tables."
picnic: ^Who's this kid just standing around these pristine picnic tables?
^No, you asked to talk to me.
^???: "And now it's time, for Richie to strut his stuff!"
^???: "Prepare your pet! For a cuteness competition!"
^Oh no, it appears that you've met your rival!
